name: Rooms of the House
description:
You awake in the middle of the night and find yourself restless...

Move about your home and let memories of you and your loved one put you at ease.

----

This is a short personal vignette of a restless night. My first ever game, made using the Bitsy engine. Music is Erik Satie's Gymnopédie no.1. Inspired by La Dispute's album "Rooms of the House." Dedicated to my love, Anjali.
